data.message: Loved the new song - don't understand all of you that want him to sound and rap about the same things at 45 that he did at 25. People change, times change, priorities change, needs change, emotions change, anger changes - maybe the problem is with the listener and not Eminem.

replies.message: Just wrote to Em and told him I admired him for precisely that!  I am Marshall’s age and people grow up!  And I have followed his entire career and he has always spoken out about injustice.  What are all you haters wasting your time on this page?
